text:
I can’t believe it!

Razumihin and Raskolnikov walk, tension rising.  
Razumihin: “I don’t believe it! I can’t believe it!”  
Raskolnikov: “Don’t believe it, then!”  
Raskolnikov smirks, cold and careless.  

---  

Bakaleyev’s lodgings loom ahead, discussions heat up.  
Razumihin: “You’re suspicious! Why weigh their words?”  
Raskolnikov: “I notice everything, unlike you.”  

---  

Razumihin halts, confused and excited.  
Razumihin: “Porfiry’s tone was strange…”  
Raskolnikov: “He’s changed his mind since last night.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Razumihin and Raskolnikov engage in a tense discussion about the implications of their recent encounters, reflecting on the strange behavior of Porfiry and Zametov.
